alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN ITASCA AND SOUTHWESTERN KOOCHICHING COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CDT... At 923 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Mizpah, to 6 miles south of Kelliher, to 9 miles northwest of Blackduck, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mizpah around 935 PM CDT. Northome around 940 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Alvwood and Squaw Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
